Text: financial modelspst Louise The base model was too large to send via email so I placed it into the common directory located at oDropboxDodger The file name is CASHBrooklynNavyYardv If you need help pulling it out of the dropbox give me a call and I will walk upstairs to bring it up I also included the model output from Power Commodity Structurings analysis of the transaction upsides Attached is a draft of the DASH please note RAC has not officially signed off Please let me know if you would like to see anything else Thanks Bill
NRG bullet pointsis a rough outline of the information that we might want to incorporate into a LOI with NRG We can discuss this at the AM meeting Thanks Bill

RE NRG bullet points Cc great to me I would prefer to leave the benchmark open and be able to talk the counterparty through how it will be established due diligence on plants higher target means greater sharing for ENE As far as cancellation is concerned I think that it would be a good idea to include a right of cancellation for NRG based on a percentage of the benchmark established Something to the effect that NRG will have the annual right to terminate the agreement if we cannot achieve of the annual gross margin target Thanks Bill Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Wednesday May PM To Keeney William Cc May Tom Marks David Scheuer Janelle Subject Re NRG bullet points Ive made some revisions the Bills document to make sure we are on the same page before I prepare the LOI File NRG Term Sheetdoc Do we want to give any sort of description of how the benchmark will be set Do we want to mention the cancellation provisions Thanks Kay

RE NRG bullet pointsAny progress on drafting a letter of intent or are you still waiting on feedback from the team Just let me know Thanks Bill Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Thursday May AM To Manis Herman Fleenor William Cc May Tom Keeney William Marks David Scheuer Janelle Subject Re NRG bullet points HermanBilly This is still very early in the process but some thought as to structure options for earning recognition might be worthwhile Kay Forwarded by Kay MannCorpEnron on AM Kay Mann PM To William nronXgate cc Tom nron David nronXgate Janelle nronXgate Subject Re NRG bullet points OLE Object StdOleLink Ive made some revisions the Bills document to make sure we are on the same page before I prepare the LOI File NRG Term Sheetdoc Do we want to give any sort of description of how the benchmark will be set Do we want to mention the cancellation provisions Thanks Kay

NRG Asset Management LOIAttached is your draft of the LOI with revisions from the origination team Please call me with any questions at x or on my mobile at As we discussed we would like to have something ready to send to the counterparty by the end of today Thanks Bill

RE NRG bullet points Cc Kay looks great to me I would prefer to leave the benchmark open and be able to talk the counterparty through how it will be established due diligence on plants higher target means greater sharing for ENE As far as cancellation is concerned I think that it would be a good idea to include a right of cancellation for NRG based on a percentage of the benchmark established Something to the effect that NRG will have the annual right to terminate the agreement if we cannot achieve of the annual gross margin target Thanks Bill Original Message From Mann Kay Sent Wednesday May PM To Keeney William Cc May Tom Marks David Scheuer Janelle Subject Re NRG bullet points Ive made some revisions the Bills document to make sure we are on the same page before I prepare the LOI File NRG Term Sheetdoc Do we want to give any sort of description of how the benchmark will be set Do we want to mention the cancellation provisions Thanks Kay

RE INGA version Markup of ADC Stock Purchase Agreem ent Cc the latest version of the stock purchase agreement Forwarded by William KeeneyHOUECT on AM on PM To cc Subject RE INGA version Markup of ADC Stock Purchase Agreem ent Here is another revised version of the SPA reflecting the revised language in Section and the GMM as well as a change in Section reflecting comments from Dee your HR person There is a cumulative blackline included from the draft sent earlier this morning as well Please let me know if you have any further comments so I can email out to Marshall Taylor et al Regards Karen Karen B Wong Milbank Tweed Hadley McCloy LLP South Figueroa Street th Floor Los Angeles California USA email office telephone office fax cellular telephone Original Message From Wong Karen Sent Monday December PM To Subject RE INGA version Markup of ADC Stock Purchase Agreement Importance High here is an interim redline of the SPA reflecting comments from our call sorry in advance for errors Karen B Wong Milbank Tweed Hadley McCloy LLP South Figueroa Street th Floor Los Angeles California USA email office telephone office fax cellular telephone This email message may contain legally privileged andor confidential information If you are not the intended recipients or the employee or agent responsible for delivery of this message to the intended recipients you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this email message is strictly prohibited If you have received this message in error please immediately notify the sender and delete this email message from your computer SPA vdoc SPA vredlinedoc SPA vcumulativebkdoc
